title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
short_description: A simple yet fulfilling breakfast that combines creamy avocado, rich poached eggs and the crunch of toast.
ingredients: Fresh herbs (such as parsley or chives, optional)

steps.title: Prep the Avocado
steps.description: Halve and pit the avocados, then scoop the flesh into a bowl. Mash with a fork until you get your desired consistency. Add salt and pepper to taste.

steps.title: Toast the Bread
steps.description: While mashing the avocado, put the slices of whole grain bread to toast.

steps.title: Poach the Eggs
steps.description: Bring water to a simmer in a small pot, then add white vinegar. Crack eggs individually into a small bowl. Gently slide the eggs into the simmering water and let cook for about 4 minutes for a soft poached consistency.

steps.title: Compile the Toasts
steps.description: Spread a generous layer of mashed avocado on each slice of toast. Place a poached egg on top, season with salt, pepper and optional chili flakes or chopped herbs.
